body: You gain temporary, intuitive insight into the immediate future during your next attack. Your next single attack roll (if it is made before the end of the next round) gains a +20 insight bonus. Additionally, you are not affected by the miss chance that applies to attackers trying to strike a concealed target.
level_text: Alchemist: 1; Arcanist: 1; Bloodrager: 1; Inquisitor: 1; Magus: 1; Sorcerer: 1; Wizard: 1

components.text: small wooden replica of an archery target

component_text: V, F (small wooden replica of an archery target)
name: True Strike
